# Precipitate Complete Breach (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Teleportation Spells|teleportation]])

**Level:** [[9th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 9]], [[9th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 18th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 18]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, M, XP

**Range:** 0 ft.

**Effect:** Complete planar breach; see text

**Duration:** See text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Planar Handbook (WotC), pg. 104

As *[[Precipitate Breach (Spell)|precipitate breach]]*, except casting this spell creates a complete breach, as described on page 152 of the *Planar Handbook*.

*Material Component:* Jade dust worth 1,000 gp sprinkled in the center of the effect.

*XP Cost:* 1,000 XP.
